To respond to all your questions-
1st of all probably some people's games screwed over and didn't think of 
re-unzipping it.
------------------
What kind of scenario that is not out there would you like to see?
Probably ones having to do with history would be fun.

Which gladiator character is the best?  why?
I'm not sure - my all-time favorite is the ghost, cause it can easily get 
everything, and when it gets beaten up just scare and go atop some water or 
something (but it needs good strength due to it's need of hand-to-hand 
combat)- but I haven't really given the others a chance...

What team is the best for handling any kind of scenario?
Probably 2 clerics and 1 archmage: They all get healed up when nessecary, 
can summon ghosts for Tryx (you may have noticed it's practically impossible 
to get by in Tryx without a flyer or teleporter). The purpose of the 
archmage? Send off chain lightnings, heartburst, teleport into the middle of 
the action and basically kick butt.


I have general question:  when you finish all the scenarios that are
shipped with the registered version of gladiator, what is the
*lowest*
  experience level that any member of your team has?  I need to know
because of plans for the scenarios I am working on.
Sorry, but I haven't finished the original levels with my mage/archmage 
combo yet, but I'll be sure to notify you when I do. I often buy them levels 
however...

Tata for now,
Sadie (The Gladiator Queen :-) )
----Original Message Follows----
From: "dph of rules " <dph_of_rules@...>

Subject: [gladiator] egroup contributions

I have noticed that of all the people subscribing to this egroup,
only
  a handfull actually post messages.  It is not like there is nothing
to talk about.  I can think of quite a few questions to be or have
been posed that almost everyone should have a comment about.

Examples:
What kind of scenario that is not out there would you like to see?
Which gladiator character is the best?  why?
What team is the best for handling any kind of scenario?

I have general question:  when you finish all the scenarios that are
shipped with the registered version of gladiator, what is the
*lowest*
  experience level that any member of your team has?  I need to know
because of plans for the scenarios I am working on.
